title: Curriculum Vitae
text:
Master of Science – Statistics and Data Science Sep 2024 – Present  Katholieke Universiteit Leuven, Leuven, Belgium
Doctor of Philosophy – Biomedical Sciences Sep 2019 – March 2025  Katholieke Universiteit Leuven, Leuven, Belgium

Thesis title: Understanding Therapeutic Outcomes in Inflammatory Bowel Diseases: Insights from Clinicomics, Proteomics, and Transcriptomics.
Pomotor: Prof.Dr. Severine Vermeire ; Co-promotor: Prof.Dr. Bram Verstockt
Defense date: March 2025

Master of Science – Health Care Management and Policy Sep 2020 – Sep 2024  Katholieke Universiteit Leuven, Leuven, Belgium

Major in “Health Care Management”
Thesis promotor: Prof.Dr. Luk Bruyneel

Doctor of Medicine Sep 2008 – Nov 2015  Damascus University, Damascus, Syria

title: Curriculum Vitae
text:
Work Experience/Postgraduate Training
PhD researcher Sep 2019 – Present
Main objectives:

Evaluate the discriminative capacity, calibration, and clinical utility of existing clinical decision support tools for predicting response to biologics in patients with inflammatory bowel disease.

Identify proteomic signatures able to predict endoscopic outcome to biologic therapy in Crohn’s disease.

Gain insights into the mechanisms of action of current therapies for ulcerative colitis using whole blood transcriptomics, and identify transcriptomic signatures able to predict their endoscopic outcome.


Hospitalist Physician Sep 2018 – Aug 2019  Diabetes clinic - University Hospitals Brussels, Brussels, Belgium
Resident – Clinical Pathology Sep 2017 – Aug 2018  University Hospitals Brussels, Brussels, Begium

title: Curriculum Vitae
text:
Software

R packages: phdcocktail1852 downloads on November 09, 2024

title: Curriculum Vitae
text:
Computational Biology Skills

Scripting: R, Python, and Unix for data manipulation, visualization, and predictive/bioinformatic analyses.
Bioinformatic algorithms and packages: proteomics, bulk and single-cell transcriptomics, spatial transcriptomics, metagenomics, metabolomics and multi-omics integration.
Quarto Publishing: articles, presentations, dashboards, and websites.
Package Development: R, Python, and Bioconductor.
Web Applications Development: using Shiny, with basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
